opendial

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    System-wide settings for OpenDial.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • Settings

        public Settings(java.util.Properties mapping)
        Creates a new settings with the values provided as argument. Values that are not explicitly specified in the mapping are set to their default values.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the properties

      • fillSettings

        public void fillSettings(java.util.Properties mapping)
        Fills the current settings with the values provided as argument. Existing values are overridden.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the properties
